name: Fashion Fight
description:
Welcome to Fashion Fight. This is JRPG and Fashion Game. And it's all about style and beating up your opponent's self-respect to zero to prove that your style is the best in your neighborhood.

Use dirty tricks and the power of your beauty to become the. Yes, it's just a queen of small corner of your city. But, you know, there always must be the first step.

The enemys might be tough at first.

Controlls:
WASD/arrows - movement
I - open inventory
H - open tutorial
Esc - open/close menu or close(shop, inentory)
